com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.listeners

Interface RouteListener


  • public interface RouteListener
    A listener that can be implemented and added to NavigationViewOptions to hook into route related events occurring in NavigationView.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowRerouteFrom(com.mapbox.geojson.Point offRoutePoint)
      Will trigger in an off route scenario.
      void onArrival()
      Will trigger when a user has arrived at a given waypoint along a DirectionsRoute.
      void onFailedReroute(String errorMessage)
      Will trigger if the request for a new DirectionsRoute fails.
      void onOffRoute(com.mapbox.geojson.Point offRoutePoint)
      Will triggered only if allowRerouteFrom(Point) returns true.
      void onRerouteAlong(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute directionsRoute)
      Will trigger when a new DirectionsRoute has been retrieved post off route.

    • Method Detail

      • allowRerouteFrom

        boolean allowRerouteFrom(com.mapbox.geojson.Point offRoutePoint)
        Will trigger in an off route scenario. Given the Point the user has gone off route, this listener can return true or false.

        Returning true will allow the SDK to proceed with the re-route process and fetch a new route with this given off route Point.

        Returning false will stop the re-route process and the user will continue without a new route in the direction they are traveling.

        Parameters:
        offRoutePoint - the given point the user has gone off route
        Returns:
        true if the reroute should be allowed, false if not
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • onOffRoute

        void onOffRoute(com.mapbox.geojson.Point offRoutePoint)
        Will triggered only if allowRerouteFrom(Point) returns true.

        This serves as the official off route event and will continue the process to fetch a new route with the given off route Point.

        Parameters:
        offRoutePoint - the given point the user has gone off route
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • onRerouteAlong

        void onRerouteAlong(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute directionsRoute)
        Will trigger when a new DirectionsRoute has been retrieved post off route.

        This is the new route the user will be following until another off route event is triggered.

        Parameters:
        directionsRoute - the new directions route
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • onFailedReroute

        void onFailedReroute(String errorMessage)
        Will trigger if the request for a new DirectionsRoute fails.
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • onArrival

        void onArrival()
        Will trigger when a user has arrived at a given waypoint along a DirectionsRoute.

        For example, if there are two LegSteps, this callback will be triggered twice, once for each waypoint.

        Since:
        0.14.0
